comment: She does not know how to use technology. You will never see grades and never get an email response. Gives you her cell number but hardly answers. I felt like I didn't learn much the 2nd part of the semester and she would cancel all of our assignments so we had no grades except the 2 take home exams which are hard bc you have to be VERY specific.

It seemed like she did not know what was going on the entire semester. When students ask questions, she never gives a direct answer which was frustrating. She was not in charge of the assignments in the syllabus so that led to a lot of confusion. She did not deliver content clearly at all. It was very confusing & stressful communicating with her.

Dr. Kuhel is an awesome professor! She is super funny and has such a passion for linguistics! She is super understanding and is helpful when students are in need. Work load was mainly weekly modules consisting of a discussion post or short assignment. Beware 2 proficiency exams which are tough and challenging. Don't put them off until the last min!
Amazing Instructor if you are self-motivated. Difficult and extensive material. Should be a 9 hour credit class. Every teacher should take applied linguistics.

Dr. Kuhel was very nice, but she took extended amounts of time to provide grades and feedback. Some of the assignments required extensive time commitments, but she valued them lower than expected. She had some trouble updating grades and assignments in the online course.

Dr. Kuhel is an expert in the field of TESOL and SPED. She is a fabulous person. But, this class was overloaded with too much to do. She constantly made changes to the syllabus throughout the semester. Her explanations of the course requirements lacked clarity. She is very scattered. Great person, absent minded professor. Be warned if you are TESOL

Is a good teacher, but watch out who you work with for the internship. If you don't get along with them and give the person a bad review, she will question it and give you a bad grade even if you are in the right.
She is wonderful!  So interesting, helpful, knowledgeable, reasonable.  Don't miss her.
Dr. Kuhel is an incredible teacher.  Her enthusiasm for her class definitely rubs off!  I only wish I could take another of her classes!I would highly recommed taking her class!

Dr. Kuhel is an amazing teacher! She is very passionate about the subject she is teaching. Her enthusiasm brings out the enthusiasm in the class! It's too bad she only teaches once a week but if you have the opportunity to take her..you will NOT regret it!
